name: Eco Green Boutique Hotel Da Nang
address: 1 An Thuong 3, Ngu Hanh Son District, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Đà Nẵng, cách Bãi biển Mỹ Khê 3 phút đi bộ, Eco Green Boutique Hotel Da Nang cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có phòng chờ chung, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, nhà hàng và quầy bar. Khách sạn 3 sao này có dịch vụ văn phòng và dịch vụ tiền sảnh. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Tại khách sạn, mỗi phòng đều có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, TV màn hình phẳng, phòng tắm riêng, ga trải giường, khăn tắm và sân hiên với view thành phố. Tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có két an toàn và một số phòng nhìn ra biển. Các phòng đều có tủ lạnh.

Tại Eco Green Boutique Hotel Da Nang, khách có thể sử dụng hồ bơi trong nhà. Khách tại chỗ nghỉ sẽ có thể tận hưởng các hoạt động ở trong Đà Nẵng và khu vực xung quanh, như đi xe đạp.

Eco Green Boutique Hotel Da Nang cách Bãi biển Bắc Mỹ An 8 phút đi bộ và Cầu khóa Tình yêu Đà Nẵng 3.2 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách khách sạn 7 km.

review.rating: Perfect, clean, professional, service. As close to the beach as you can get.
review.comment_positive: Location is fantastic (3min walk from the beach). Lots of varied restaurants & bars around. Staff are very attentive, professional and helpful (ie booking GRAB taxis for you). Inhouse restaurant has a super English Breakfast....and the Paninis are spot on. I can't fault anything - this place is really top (coming from a hotel ownee himself). Well done. O e last thing - they have THE most adorable, lazy & friendly Corgi house dog chilling at the front door. He loves his belly rubs :-)
review.comment_negative: All was perfect

review.comment_positive: gần biển nv nhiệt tình
review.comment_negative: view chưa đẹp, nên gọi kh xg ăn sáng nếu kh có ngủ quyên thì tuyệt vời

review.comment_positive: A wonderful stay, the room was very large,tastefully decorated, immaculately clean and has the most comfortable bed & pillows. Breakfast was really good & the staff were super attentive, every member of staff we met at the hotel were extremely friendly. We had a lovely stay & would not hesitate to return.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike everything was perfect!

review.rating: Have already told friends to stay here - I’d come  back!
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. The included  breakfast was plentiful and  fresh. The juice and coffee bar in the lobby was pro, and  the location is in the heart of the beach scene, close to everything.

review.rating: I love this hotel and will definitely stay here the next time I’m in Da Nang!
review.room_type: Phòng Eco Ấm Cúng Có Ban Công Lớn
review.comment_positive: This was by far my favorite place that we stayed in Southeast Asia (Thailand, Vietnam, Japan)!  The staff was so friendly, nice, welcoming, and helpful. The included breakfast each day was so delicious. The location was only a few blocks to the beach and is in the heart of a tourist section of the city. Which means, you can basically walk a few blocks to get anything you may need.
review.comment_negative: Wish there had been a microwave oven in the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Eco Ấm Cúng Có Ban Công Lớn
review.comment_positive: We loved the hotel, everything is great, very comfortable, clean, good service, excellent, thank you very much

review.room_type: Phòng Eco Ấm Cúng Có Ban Công Lớn
review.comment_positive: Very good situated, close to the beach, perfect room, 9th floor, good breakfast - and everything for a really good price.

review.rating: A lovely hotel in a fab part of Da Nang
review.comment_positive: The location is really great, pretty much on the riverfront and at the centre of the western section. Room was spacious and comfortable. The pool and the pool area were very nice and also very clean. There is also a lovely snack bar on the ground floor.
review.comment_negative: If there was any complaint it would just be a request for a little more western food options.

review.comment_positive: Excellent breakfast, pleasant swimming pool, good location about 100 m from the beach, nice and clean room

Everything was great, great rooms, super clean, delicious breakfast. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They went above and beyond by modifying the breakfast to accommodate for a gluten allergy. 100% recommended!
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

The included breakfast each day was so delicious. The location was only a few blocks to the beach and is in the heart of a tourist section of the city. Which means, you can basically walk a few blocks to get anything you may need.
review.comment_negative: Wish there had been a microwave oven in the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Eco Ấm Cúng Có Ban Công Lớn
review.comment_positive: We loved the hotel, everything is great, very comfortable, clean, good service, excellent, thank you very much

review.room_type: Phòng Eco Ấm Cúng Có Ban Công Lớn
review.comment_positive: Very good situated, close to the beach, perfect room, 9th floor, good breakfast - and everything for a really good price.

review.rating: A lovely hotel in a fab part of Da Nang
review.comment_positive: The location is really great, pretty much on the riverfront and at the centre of the western section. Room was spacious and comfortable. The pool and the pool area were very nice and also very clean. There is also a lovely snack bar on the ground floor.
review.comment_negative: If there was any complaint it would just be a request for a little more western food options.

review.comment_positive: Excellent breakfast, pleasant swimming pool, good location about 100 m from the beach, nice and clean room

Everything was great, great rooms, super clean, delicious breakfast. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They went above and beyond by modifying the breakfast to accommodate for a gluten allergy. 100% recommended!
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.rating: Perfect, clean, professional, service. As close to the beach as you can get.
review.comment_positive: Location is fantastic (3min walk from the beach). Lots of varied restaurants & bars around. Staff are very attentive, professional and helpful (ie booking GRAB taxis for you). Inhouse restaurant has a super English Breakfast....and the Paninis are spot on. I can't fault anything - this place is really top (coming from a hotel ownee himself). Well done. O e last thing - they have THE most adorable, lazy & friendly Corgi house dog chilling at the front door. He loves his belly rubs :-)
review.comment_negative: All was perfect

review.comment_positive: gần biển nv nhiệt tình
review.comment_negative: view chưa đẹp, nên gọi kh xg ăn sáng nếu kh có ngủ quyên thì tuyệt vời

review.comment_positive: A wonderful stay, the room was very large,tastefully decorated, immaculately clean and has the most comfortable bed & pillows. Breakfast was really good & the staff were super attentive, every member of staff we met at the hotel were extremely friendly. We had a lovely stay & would not hesitate to return.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike everything was perfect!

review.rating: Have already told friends to stay here - I’d come  back!
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. The included  breakfast was plentiful and  fresh. The juice and coffee bar in the lobby was pro, and  the location is in the heart of the beach scene, close to everything.

review.rating: I love this hotel and will definitely stay here the next time I’m in Da Nang!
